name: part_006
file: tmp_【#白上フブキ生誕LIVE】Congrats Birthday FOX【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ】 [7Vs-5Rwu8ks]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Kurokami Fubuki performing 'Fixer' on a dark stage with purple and red lighting.
Instrumental transition scene as the stage atmosphere changes.
Shirakami Fubuki and Kurokami Fubuki perform 'L0s! L0s! L0s!' together.

subtitles.original: 明日じゃない　昨日でもない　自分のみがわりが欲しくてたまらない
subtitles.english: Not tomorrow, nor yesterday, I'm dying for a surrogate of myself.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫と言い捨てて　後から君のせいにさせてはくれないか
subtitles.english: Saying "it's fine" and leaving, won't you let me blame it on you later?

subtitles.original: 今更意味ないから　後から君のせいにさせてはくれないか
subtitles.english: It's pointless now, so won't you let me blame it on you later?

subtitles.original: 出来ない約束を　とうとうと溢れる　一言一言ばかりに　脳を暴かれるくらい
subtitles.english: To the point where my brain is being exposed by word after word of overflowing impossible promises.

subtitles.original: 意味をなさない　何も出来ない　見えない　逃げたい　跳びたい　やめたい　逸らせない
subtitles.english: Meaningless, can't do anything, can't see, want to run, want to jump, want to stop, can't look away.

subtitles.original: だから沈め　沈め　這い上がれないほどまで
subtitles.english: So sink, sink, to the point where you can't crawl back up.

subtitles.original: 飽きるまで　踊らせて　どうせ　救い垂らす時まで
subtitles.english: Let me dance until I'm bored, at least until the moment salvation is granted.

subtitles.original: 嘘味の粒々を　喉から絞め出して悲鳴ごと噛み砕く
subtitles.english: Squeezing out lie-flavored grains from my throat, crushing them along with the screams.

subtitles.original: 笑顔が痛むばかりで　じっと唇に手を当て過ごす
subtitles.english: My smile just hurts, so I spend time with my hand pressed against my lips.

subtitles.original: なりたくなかった　今日役立つな　虚ろで眠たい理想で　救われることを待つ
subtitles.english: I didn't want to become this, don't be useful today, waiting to be saved by hollow, sleepy ideals.

subtitles.original: 一番目は今の口代わりを　力強く硬く痛く噛み締めて
subtitles.english: First, strongly, hard, and painfully bite down on the current scapegoat.

subtitles.original: 死んでしまえ　しまえ　この先も過去を知らず
subtitles.english: Just die, die, without knowing the future or the past.

subtitles.original: 嫌いなら　壊せ　壊せ　どうせなら加害者になればいい
subtitles.english: If you hate it, break it, break it, you might as well become the perpetrator.

subtitles.original: 戦わない　苛立ちも　何も生まない悲しみも
subtitles.english: Neither the irritation from not fighting, nor the sadness that produces nothing.

subtitles.original: 味気なくて　吐き出す前に　もう　次を歌え
subtitles.english: It's tasteless, before spitting it out, sing the next one already.

subtitles.original: どうせなら　踊り踊れ　灰色になり切る前に
subtitles.english: At least dance, dance, before becoming completely gray.

subtitles.original: 打ち鳴らせ　変われ変われ　眠りに落ちる時まで
subtitles.english: Ring it out, change, change, until the moment you fall asleep.

subtitles.original: どうせなら　奪え奪え　飼い馴らした嘘を暴いて
subtitles.english: At least take it, take it, exposing the tamed lies.

subtitles.original: 煮え滾る　頭に過った　虚像を　見ていた
subtitles.english: Watching the virtual image that crossed my boiling mind.

subtitles.original: 自分を見ていた
subtitles.english: I was watching myself.

subtitles.original: Feuer sperre! Feuer los! Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!
subtitles.english: Feuer sperre! Feuer los! Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!

subtitles.original: 戦場へ出ろ　兵士として死の淵まで　命捨てた　その覚悟を示せ
subtitles.english: Go to the battlefield! As a soldier, to the brink of death, show the resolve to discard your life.

subtitles.original: 聞こえるだろう　あの放戦が　成功をする　凱歌の声だ
subtitles.english: You can hear it, right? That artillery fire, it's the sound of a successful victory song.

subtitles.original: 踏み潰せ　踏み潰せ
subtitles.english: Trample them down! Trample them down!

subtitles.original: Feuer sperre! Feuer los! Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!
subtitles.english: Feuer sperre! Feuer los! Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!

subtitles.original: 散々のアメに　打たれ行くのか　硝煙千番　国の為だ
subtitles.english: Will you go through the terrible rain of bullets? A thousand gunsmoke trials, it's for the country.

subtitles.original: 戦場へ出ろ　兵士として死の淵まで　命捨てた　覚悟を示せよ
subtitles.english: Go to the battlefield! As a soldier, to the brink of death, show the resolve to discard your life.

subtitles.original: 忠誠を自由を捧げて　その魂を　すべて捧げ　勝ち鬨を上げよう
subtitles.english: Dedicate your loyalty and freedom, give all of that soul, and let's raise a victory shout.

subtitles.original: さあ誇り　築いてみせろ　天に轟く一閃を
subtitles.english: Now, show that you can build pride, a flash of light that roars to the heavens.

subtitles.original: Feuer sperre! Feuer los! Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!
subtitles.english: Feuer sperre! Feuer los! Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!
